#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	unsigned long long int n,a;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    cin>>n;
	    a=1;
	    n--;
	    while(n--)
        {
            a*=2;
            if(a>=1000)
                a=a%1000;
        }
        cout<<a<<endl;
	}
    return 0;
}
